statements: SELECT * FROM InterviewFeedback;
SELECT candidate_id, interviewer, overall_rating FROM InterviewFeedback;
SELECT * FROM InterviewFeedback WHERE candidate_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT interview_id, interview_date, interview_feedback FROM InterviewFeedback ORDER BY interview_date DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_interviews FROM InterviewFeedback;
SELECT * FROM InterviewFeedback ORDER BY interview_date DESC, overall_rating ASC, feedback_date
SELECT candidate_id, interviewer, overall_rating FROM InterviewFeedback WHERE overall_rating > 3 ORDER BY overall_rating DESC
SELECT DISTINCT interviewer, COUNT(*) AS number_of_interviews FROM InterviewFeedback GROUP BY interviewer HAVING COUNT(*) > 2
SELECT candidate_id, interview_feedback FROM InterviewFeedback WHERE interview_feedback IS NOT NULL AND feedback_date > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date
SELECT AVG(overall_rating) AS avg_rating, MAX(overall_rating) AS max_rating, MIN(overall_rating) AS min_rating FROM InterviewFeedback WHERE interviewer = 'John Doe'
SELECT * FROM interviews WHERE interview_date = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM interviews WHERE interview_location = 'Headquarters';
SELECT interview_date, interview_time FROM interviews WHERE candidate_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM interviews WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL;
SELECT interview_location, feedback FROM interviews WHERE candidate_id = '78901234-1234-5678-9012-345678901234';
SELECT * FROM interviews WHERE candidate_id = '1234-5678-9012';
SELECT feedback, interview_date FROM interviews ORDER BY interview_date DESC;
SELECT team_name, team_size FROM hiring_teams WHERE team_size > 5 ORDER BY team_size ASC;
SELECT team_name, team_lead, team_email FROM hiring_teams WHERE team_name LIKE 'T%' AND team_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT interview_location, interview_time FROM interviews ORDER BY interview_time, interview_location;
SELECT * FROM InterviewSchedule;
SELECT interview_date, interview_time, room_number FROM InterviewSchedule WHERE interview_id = '123abc';
SELECT interview_time, interview_date FROM InterviewSchedule WHERE room_number = 101 ORDER BY interview_date DESC;
SELECT team_member_id, name, role FROM TeamMember WHERE role = 'Software Engineer';
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, rating FROM Feedback WHERE rating >= 3 AND rating <= 5 ORDER BY rating DESC, feedback_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM InterviewSchedule;
SELECT interview_id, candidate_id, interview_date, interview_time FROM InterviewSchedule WHERE room_number = 5;
SELECT i.interview_date, i.interview_time, f.feedback_text, f.rating FROM InterviewSchedule i JOIN Feedback f ON i.interview_id = f.interview_id;
SELECT t.name AS team_member_name, t.role, f.feedback_text AS feedback FROM TeamMember t JOIN Feedback f ON t.team_member_id = f.team_member_id;

SELECT i.interview_id, i.interview_date, f.rating, t.name AS team_member_name FROM InterviewSchedule i JOIN Feedback f ON i.interview_id = f.interview_id JOIN TeamMember t ON f.team_member_id = t.team_member_id WHERE f.rating > 3 ORDER BY i.interview_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM InterviewSchedules WHERE interview_id = 1;
SELECT candidate_name, interview_date FROM InterviewSchedules WHERE room_number = 101;
SELECT * FROM HiringTeams WHERE team_size > 5 ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT feedback_text, feedback_given_by, feedback_given_date FROM Feedbacks WHERE feedback_id = 2;
SELECT candidate_name, candidate_email FROM Candidates WHERE candidate_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM InterviewSchedules WHERE room_number = 101 ORDER BY interview_date DESC, interview_time ASC
SELECT candidate_name, interview_date FROM InterviewSchedules WHERE interviewer_name = 'John Doe' AND interview_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT candidate_name, interview_time FROM InterviewSchedules WHERE interview_date = '2022-06-15' AND room_number IN (101, 102)
SELECT interview_id, candidate_name, interview_date, interviewer_name FROM InterviewSchedules WHERE room_number = 101 AND interview_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-07-31'
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text, feedback_given_by FROM Feedbacks WHERE feedback_given_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_given_date DESC
SELECT * FROM interview_schedules
SELECT candidate_name, interview_date FROM interview_schedules
SELECT candidate_name, interview_date, interview_time FROM interview_schedules WHERE interviewer_name = 'John Doe'
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM interview_feedback
SELECT team_name, team_lead FROM hiring_teams
SELECT candidate_name, interview_date, interview_time, interviewer_name FROM interview_schedules;
SELECT candidate_name, feedback_text, rating FROM interview_feedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT team_name, team_lead, member_name, member_role FROM hiring_teams JOIN team_members ON hiring_teams.team_id = team_members.team_id;
SELECT candidate_name, email, phone_number FROM candidates WHERE email IS NOT NULL ORDER BY candidate_name DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT interviewer_name, interview_date FROM interview_schedules WHERE interview_date >= '2022-01-01';
